snippet: More than 100 prospective jurors filled out questionnaires, as lawyers sought to identify conflicts that might disqualify them from serving in the corruption trial of the former Assembly speaker.
abstract: Prosecutors and defense lawyers in corruption trial of New York Assemblyman Sheldon Silver assess over 100 prospective jurors for trial; Silver stands accused of using his office to receive almost $4 million in illegal payments from two law firms.
lead_paragraph: More than 100 prospective jurors filled out questionnaires, as lawyers sought to identify conflicts that might disqualify them from serving in the corruption trial of the former Assembly speaker.

headline.print_headline: Potential Jurors Screened in Silver Case
headline.main: Potential Jurors Screened in Sheldon Silver Case
